mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_comment (member_id, post_id, content) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{postId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT pc.post_comment_id as commentId, pc.content, m.name as author, pc.created_at as createdAt, CASE WHEN m.member_id = #{memberId} THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END as isMyComment FROM post_comment pc, member m WHERE pc.post_id = #{postId} AND pc.member_id = m.member_id ORDER BY pc.created_at
